snippet: The Bureau for Solving Problems That May or May Not Be Problems offers a primer for helping your child distinguish Sportacus, on “LuckyTown,” from “Spartacus.”
abstract: Neil Genzlinger offers primer for helping children distinguish between character of Sportacus on PBS Kids Sprout children's television show LazyTown and Starz gladiator-themed series Spartacus.

snippet: 634 submissions later, we announce the four group and six individual winners of our rap lyrics contest. Congratulations, and thank you participants and teachers.
abstract: 634 submissions later, we announce the four group and six individual winners of our rap lyrics contest. Congratulations, and thank you participants and teachers.

headline.main: Student Contest Winners | The 2012 Year in Rap

snippet: Hopes were raised when the Finnish cellphone maker said it would turn a profit, but sales of its Lumia smartphone line generated less revenue than expected.
abstract: Nokia reports fourth-quarter profit of 202 million euros, or $269 million, up from a loss of 1.1 billion euros in the same period a year earlier; is company's first quarterly profit in almost two years, but shares fall due to continuing doubts about a turnaround.

headline.main: Nokia Reports Profit but Fails to Soothe Investors
headline.print_headline:
Nokia Reports a Profit
After a String of Losses

snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index briefly climbed above 1,500 for the first time since December 2007, but fell back. Apple shares lost 12 percent.
abstract: Stocks remain steady as strong economic data lifts sentiment and offsets sharp decline in price of Apple’s shares.

headline.main: Economic Data Briefly Lifts S.&P. Over 1,500
headline.print_headline: Economic Data Briefly Lifts S.&P. Over 1,500

snippet: Also, Apple disappoints and some longtime employees are laid off at Rolling Stone.
abstract: Also, Apple disappoints and some longtime employees are laid off at Rolling Stone.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Assange Assails 'Propaganda' Film, and Netflix Surges

snippet: A.I.G.'s lawyers warned the board about the dangers of joining a lawsuit against the government, a court filing shows. | Court documents shed new light on what bankers knew at the height of the housing bubble. | Goldman Sachs won a legal fight ove...
abstract: A.I.G.'s lawyers warned the board about the dangers of joining a lawsuit against the government, a court filing shows. | Court documents shed new light on what bankers knew at the height of the housing bubble. | Goldman Sachs won a legal fight over its role in the doomed sale of Dragon Systems to Lernout & Hauspie. | Neel T. Kashkari is planning to run for government office.

headline.main: Inside A.I.G.'s Decision Not to Sue

snippet: Because of Apple's great success in recent years, many investors have come to expect nothing short of perfection from it. And while it is still widely considered the most innovative company in the technology world, Apple is facing a range of chall...
abstract: Because of Apple's great success in recent years, many investors have come to expect nothing short of perfection from it. And while it is still widely considered the most innovative company in the technology world, Apple is facing a range of challenges.

headline.main: Daily Report: Apple's Stock Drops Despite Huge Profit

snippet: Wanelo, an up-and-coming e-commerce site, lets people browse through beautifully arranged collections of clothing and other items, and links visitors to stores where they can buy the products.
abstract: Wanelo, an up-and-coming e-commerce site, lets people browse through beautifully arranged collections of clothing and other items, and links visitors to stores where they can buy the products.

headline.main: Wanelo: Social Commerce Site Is Big With Young Shoppers

snippet: Digital tools offer new mothers help with a range of tasks, including writing thank-you notes, getting back to the pre-baby weight, ordering diapers and other necessities, and calming the little one.
abstract: Tool Kit column notes digital tools that offer new mothers help with tasks like shedding baby weight, ordering diapers and calming the baby.

headline.main: Apps and Other Digital Tools Lend a Hand to New Mothers
headline.print_headline: Apps and Devices Assist New Mothers

snippet: Google and I.B.M. posted solid earnings, and investors were encouraged when the House agreed to let the government pay its bills into May.
abstract: Dow Jones industrial average reaches five-year high as Google and IBM post solid earnings; investors are encouraged when the House agrees to let government pay its bills into May 2013.

headline.main: Technology Shares Help Dow Reach 5-Year High
headline.print_headline: Technology Shares Help Dow Reach 5-Year High
